alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 25 at 10:11AM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 to 70 mph possible, with locally higher gusts along the Sierra crest. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley Counties. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
